## Context

What problem or situation led to this request?

## Problem Statement

Describe the problem in clear, technical terms.

## Proposed Solution

Suggested implementation approach, architecture, APIs, etc.

## (Opt.) Alternatives Considered

What other options were evaluated?

## (Opt.) Impact & Dependencies

Systems, repos, services, contracts, users impacted.

## (Opt.) Risks & Constraints

Security, performance, migration concerns, etc.

## Acceptance Criteria

What must be true for this to be considered done?
